title: [Oak Grove, Stream]
description: Flame-red shelf fungi line the ancient trunks of the trees, while their roots are laden with deep green moss.  A small stream flows through the surrounding underbrush, its soft trickles providing a pleasant accompaniment to the quiet trills of birds and the soft rustle of the plants against one another.  Clusters of purple flowers chase the edges of the stream, their vivid hue starkly contrasted by the solid green.

Flame-red shelf fungi line the ancient trunks of the trees, while their roots are laden with deep green moss.  A small stream flows through the surrounding underbrush, its soft trickles providing a pleasant accompaniment to the quiet trills of birds and the soft chirrups of many a hidden frog.  Clusters of purple flowers chase the edges of the stream, their vivid hue starkly contrasted by the solid green
